name: iOS 14.3 and iPadOS 14.3
available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Air 2 and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Air 2 and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: An enterprise application installation prompt may display the wrong domain
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved state management.

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Air 2 and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted audio file may disclose restricted memory
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds read was addressed with improved input validation.

cves.credit: Anonymous working with Trend Micro Zero Day Initiative

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Air 2 and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted audio file may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds write issue was addressed with improved bounds checking.

cves.credit: JunDong Xie of Ant Security Light-Year Lab

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Air 2 and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: A remote attacker may be able to leak memory
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds read was addressed with improved bounds checking.

cves.credit: Xingwei Lin of Ant Security Light-Year Lab

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Air 2 and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted font may result in the disclosure of process memory
advisories.description: An information disclosure issue was addressed with improved state management.

cves.credit: Mateusz Jurczyk of Google Project Zero

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Air 2 and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted font file may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: A memory corruption issue existed in the processing of font files. This issue was addressed with improved input validation.

cves.credit: Mateusz Jurczyk of Google Project Zero
Mateusz Jurczyk of Google Project Zero
Mateusz Jurczyk of Google Project Zero

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Air 2 and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted image may lead to a denial of service
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds read was addressed with improved input validation.

cves.credit: Xingwei Lin of Ant Security Light-Year Lab

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Air 2 and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted image may lead to heap corruption
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds read was addressed with improved input validation.

cves.credit: Xingwei Lin of Ant Security Light-Year Lab
Xingwei Lin of Ant Security Light-Year Lab

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Air 2 and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted image may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds read was addressed with improved input validation.

cves.credit: Xingwei Lin of Ant Security Light-Year Lab

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Air 2 and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted image may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds write issue was addressed with improved bounds checking.

cves.credit: Alexandru-Vlad Niculae working with Google Project Zero

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Air 2 and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted file may lead to heap corruption
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved checks.

cves.credit: ZhiWei Sun(@5n1p3r0010) of Topsec Alpha Lab

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Air 2 and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted USD file may lead to unexpected application termination or arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: A buffer overflow issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Air 2 and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: Unauthorized code execution may lead to an authentication policy violation
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved checks.

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Air 2 and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: A user may be unable to fully delete browsing history
advisories.description: "Clear History and Website Data" did not clear the history. The issue was addressed with improved data deletion.

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Air 2 and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: A use after free issue was addressed with improved memory management.

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Air 2 and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: A buffer overflow was addressed with improved size validation.
